channel.title: 0.9.0 Patch Notes
channel.description:
# Beta Is Here
## General: * Added some SFX for executions and the UI in-game. * Currently all the UI buttons will pretty much be the same noise. More variety will come later. * The SFX for the executions will be expanded upon later. * The king voting system has been changed. More than 2 players can step up now. Royals still have the chance to step up first. Players will have 45 seconds to make their case while voting happens. * 2 new weapons. The Kickstarter sword and a morning star. * (After testing, Kickstarter sword+armor will be wiped permanently except for Dukes+) * Drastically improved load times with art + animation. * Cursor now hides during loading screen * New message to let people know chat exists when joining a room.
## Fool: * Added Foolish night ability that allows the Fool to frame themself. Will likely be given a better name at some point. Has 2 uses.
## Duchess: * Dark wisp now affects the entire Unseen and is limited to 2 uses. * The Mastermind will appear as an Observer and the Assassin will appear as a Butler.
## Illusionist: * Removed Trance. * Added Telepathy. * Mental Blur now has 2 uses.
## Princess: * Flirt has been changed to show the same pairing of classes. One pairing is Killer and Offensive type, so if you flirt with a Killer class it will always show they are Killer or Offensive.
#### The pairings are: * Killer/Offensive * Special/Investigative * Support/Social * Wildcard classes will appear as Killer/Offensive.
## Psychic: * Removed Visions.
## Bug Fixes: * Loading screen starts faster when host starts the game * Exit button on login screen * GP calculations should reflect what you actually get * End screen mixups (+Thronebot end reports) should be fixed * Fixed gender for female armors in "My Character" * Private room checkbox is now hidden when JOINING a room * Unleash Souls can no longer target the King.

item.description:
Fixed stuff in 30b. It’s quite stable! THAT LOADING SCREEN SPEED + EXECUTION SOUNDS, THO!

Known bugs:

  • Sometimes a person is in your room or in the middle of a table
  • Customization in lobby has a pending back-end revamp to fix tons of misc. bugs.

item.title: 0.9.0 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
I feel like every Xmas wish of mine was received and granted!

It’s odd that the Assassin is shown as a Butler under the effect of Dark Wisp. Interesting choice. Could be hard to prove, but it’s better than being seen as the Assassin after all.

Thank god stepping up for King isn’t restricted to those with the fastest mouse and fingers.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.0 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
Beta Is Here

General:

  • Added some SFX for executions and the UI in-game.
  • Currently all the UI buttons will pretty much be the same noise. More variety will come later.
  • The SFX for the executions will be expanded upon later.
  • The king voting system has been changed. More than 2 players can step up now. Royals still have the chance to step up first. Players will have 45 seconds to make their case while voting happens.
  • 2 new weapons. The Kickstarter sword and a morning star.
  • (After testing, Kickstarter sword+armor will be wiped permanently except for Dukes+)
  • Drastically improved load times with art + animation.
  • Cursor now hides during loading screen
  • New message to let people know chat exists when joining a room.

Fool:

  • Added Foolish night ability that allows the Fool to frame themself. Will likely be given a better name at some point. Has 2 uses.

Duchess:

  • Dark wisp now affects the entire Unseen and is limited to 2 uses.
  • The Mastermind will appear as an Observer and the Assassin will appear as a Butler.

Illusionist:

  • Removed Trance.
  • Added Telepathy.
  • Mental Blur now has 2 uses.

Princess:

  • Flirt has been changed to show the same pairing of classes. One pairing is Killer and Offensive type, so if you flirt with a Killer class it will always show they are Killer or Offensive.

The pairings are:

  • Killer/Offensive
  • Special/Investigative
  • Support/Social
  • Wildcard classes will appear as Killer/Offensive.

Psychic:

  • Removed Visions.

Bug Fixes:

  • Loading screen starts faster when host starts the game
  • Exit button on login screen
  • GP calculations should reflect what you actually get
  • End screen mixups (+Thronebot end reports) should be fixed
  • Fixed gender for female armors in “My Character”
  • Private room checkbox is now hidden when JOINING a room
  • Unleash Souls can no longer target the King.

Read full topic
